TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaImporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 XML 架构元素声明（包括 WSDL 文档中的文本 XSD 消息部分）生成到 .NET Framework 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Web 服务描述语言工具使用类 ( # A0) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)和 类，同时从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类。The class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) and the class while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 在从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档生成类时， [Web 服务描述语言工具 ( # A0) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) 也使用该类。The class is also used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. 使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe，而不是直接使用此类。Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类包含的方法可用于为 XSD 文档中定义的元素或作为 WSDL 文档中的部分的元素生成内部 .NET Framework 映射。The class has methods to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a WSDL document. 以下列表显示了何时使用类 Wsdl.exe：The following list shows when the class is used by Wsdl.exe: - WSDL 文档指定文本用法，其中，SOAP 消息参数的内容和返回值 (或请求和响应文档) 按原义使用 XML 架构定义进行指定。A WSDL document specifies literal use, where the content of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) is literally specified with XML schema definitions. - WSDL 文档通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作指定 Web 服务的 .NET Framework 非 SOAP 实现。A WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，采用 对象的集合，表示 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 文本消息所使用的 XML 架构。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking a collection of objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP literal messages defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 WSDL 文档指定根据 () 的架构对数据进行序列化时，请使用此构造函数 \ 。Use this constructor when a WSDL document specifies that the data is serialized according to a schema (\). 不要直接创建类的实例，而是 使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of directly creating an instance of the class, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe.

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的单个 (SOAP) 文本元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single, (SOAP) literal element part defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: 表示 WSDL 消息定义中单个元素部分的 .NET Framework 类型映射的 。

span.span: An representing the .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wsdl.exe 工具在从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时使用方法。The method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 请不要直接调用此方法，而应使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类仅在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 当 WSDL 消息具有单个 part 元素但该部件尚未标识为包装器元素时，则使用方法。The method is used when a WSDL message has a single part element but the part has not been identified as a wrapper element.

summary.span: 为 XML 架构文档中定义的元素或作为 WSDL 文档的部分的元素生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for an element defined in an XML schema document or as a part in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsd.exe 工具使用方法的此重载从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档生成类。This overload of the method is used by the Xsd.exe tool to generate classes from an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 使用 Xsd.exe，而不是直接调用此方法。Instead of calling this method directly, use Xsd.exe.

summary.span: 为 XML 架构文档中定义的元素或作为 WSDL 文档的部分的元素生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsd.exe 工具使用方法的此重载从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档生成类。This overload of the method is used by the Xsd.exe tool to generate classes from an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 它还由 Wsdl.exe 工具在从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时使用。It also is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 请不要直接调用此方法，而应使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe.

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的使用文本的 SOAP 消息的元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the element parts of a literal-use SOAP message defined in a WSDL document.

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single element part of a literal-use SOAP message defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: 包含单个元素部分的 WSDL 消息定义的 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping for a WSDL message definition containing a single element part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的方法 由 Wsdl.exe 工具在从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时使用。The method of the class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 请不要直接调用此方法，而应使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类仅在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 当 WSDL 消息包装在单个部件元素中时，将使用此重载。This overload is used when a WSDL message is wrapped within a single part element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wsdl.exe 工具在从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时使用方法。The method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 请不要直接调用此方法，而应使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类仅在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 参数的值 `names` 包含 WSDL 文档中的消息定义下的 parts 元素的限定名。The value of the `names` parameter contains the qualified names of the parts elements under a message definition in a WSDL document. 此方法不考虑部件元素的类型。This method does not account for the part elements' types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wsdl.exe 工具在从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时使用方法。The method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 请不要直接调用此方法，而应使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类仅在 WSDL 文档指定文本使用时使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 参数的值 `names` 包含 WSDL 文档中的消息定义下的 parts 元素的限定名。The value of the `names` parameter contains the qualified names of the parts elements under a message definition in a WSDL document. 此方法不考虑部件元素的类型。This method does not account for the part elements' types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsd.exe 工具在生成类 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档时使用此方法。The method is used by the Xsd.exe tool while generating classes XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 使用 Xsd.exe，而不是直接调用此方法。Instead of calling this method directly, use Xsd.exe. 此方法不考虑 XML 架构元素的类型。This method does not account for the XML schema element's type.
